Text: The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it was imposing sanctions on five Chinese nationals and six entities that it said had violated Washington's unilateral curbs on Tehran,  These included two Cosco Shipping Corporation subsidiaries, Cosco Shipping Tanker Dalian and Cosco Shipping Tanker (Dalian) Seaman and Ship Management Co Ltd.
Cause: it said had violated Washington's unilateral curbs on Tehran,  These included two Cosco Shipping Corporation subsidiaries, Cosco Shipping Tanker Dalian and Cosco Shipping Tanker (Dalian) Seaman and Ship Management Co Ltd.
Effect: The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it was imposing sanctions on five Chinese nationals and six entities
Sentence: <e2>The U.S. Treasury Department said on Wednesday it was imposing sanctions on five Chinese nationals and six entities</e2> that <e1>it said had violated Washington's unilateral curbs on Tehran,  These included two Cosco Shipping Corporation subsidiaries, Cosco Shipping Tanker Dalian and Cosco Shipping Tanker (Dalian) Seaman and Ship Management Co Ltd.</e1>
